HandleMessage<TKey>(IDictionary<TKey, Action<JToken>>, TKey, JToken)

Handles single incoming message. Select handler from generic handlers map handlers using messageType parameter as a key and pass message parameter as value into the selected handler. All exceptions are caught inside this method and reported to client via standard OnError event.

Declaration
protected void HandleMessage<TKey>(IDictionary<TKey, Action<JToken>> handlers, TKey messageType, JToken message)

    where TKey : class
Parameters
Type Name Description
System.Collections.Generic.IDictionary<TKey, System.Action<Newtonsoft.Json.Linq.JToken>> handlers

Message handlers map.
TKey messageType

Message type for selecting handler from map.
Newtonsoft.Json.Linq.JToken message

Message data for processing by selected handler.
